title: Highlights missing audio
body: This has been happening for a few days now. Trying to clip footage from replays yet when I try to view them the audio is replaced with a crackle or some static every now and then. What gives?

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa I've been noticing more these weird reports of screeching noises in players replays lately. It seems like most of the time those noises are caused by third-party programs or something else running in the background when the game was played or the highlight was recorded. Let's try doing a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to ensure nothing else is running in the background, try recording that highlight again, and let me know if the noise is still there.
Did a completely clean boot, opened up league, clipped the highlight and still no audio but crackles.

Hmmmm well dang. We've been tracking cases of this noise in highlights so that we can get a better fix going, so go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to help more than I can here on the boards!
